results: We've eaten in Vista 3 times during our stay and have been attended to by Jeffrey and Angel each time. Excellent service by both waiters.

Had an amazing meal, great service and food was spectacular. Want to mention all the front of house staff : Maureen, Vinay, Imryaz, Amrv and Clint and also the chef and sous chefs that didn't see including the kitchen porters .

Beautifully presented food and the flavour matched. First time I've had madras and it was outstanding. Sea Bass was amazing as well. Service was first class, nothing a bother to any staff members. Lovely touch the chef visiting the table to make sure all was ok. I'm gluten free and the staff went out of the way to make sure all my food was safe. Well done team.

May I say this is a beautiful restaurant. The service and quality of food Amazing,  this is the best one on board we think, have tried a few this our favourite. Besalel our waiter was absolutely amazing personalty he was so kind and couldn't do enough, was so funny, that's what I call service. I better not forget our other 2 friends Darel and Makbin....keep up the good work boys...
We've eaten in Vista 3 times during our stay and have been attended to by Jeffrey and Angel each time. Excellent service by both waiters.

Ali and Ranveer have excellent service, manners and made our family meal wonderful! Very well presented and attentive! And the little lady too didn't get her name but very polite and sweet !
Food was incredible and been a few times !

Found the host quite rude. Wouldn't let us go to our table 10 mins early

Found the host quite rude. Wouldn't let us go to our table 10 mins early (despite there being tables empty and had been empty for an hour at least) as he claimed they were fully booked. Fine. But then a group of 5 came without a booking and he sat them straight away. Food wasn't great, meatballs were lovely but the croquettes were poor
Excellent service from Hendrix ,Ranni and the chefs very good food can't fault it.
Excellent service from Hendrix ,Ranni and the chefs very good food can't fault it.

Ali and Ranveer have excellent service, manners and made our family meal wonderful! Very well presented and attentive! And the little lady too didn't get her name but very polite and sweet !
Food was incredible and been a few times !
Umesh particularly. So friendly and chatty. He couldn't do enough.

Lovely service received tonight on table 130 from Umesh particularly. So friendly and chatty. He couldn't do enough for my family ( cabins 4085, 4081 and 4084). Excellent service,  he and his colleagues Valencio and Sanjay are a credit to your company.

Thanks so much to Sanjay, Umesh and Valencio for a fabulous evening at the Vista restaurant. They were so attentive and welcoming, whilst answering all the questions we had. Their humour and smiles kept us entertained all night - we can't wait to come back!

Valencio's humour and smiles kept us entertained all night.

Our waiter Taufiq - what a man! Attentive, noted when wine was getting low, knew/remembered our preferences, that I was coeliac, our wine, can't fault him! 
Thank you for managing the gluten free options, pre-ordered and fulfilled beautifully (my only disappointment all week was the lamb in herb gravy- was served DRY? No gravy (when I had pre-ordered) 
Rawkla, kind efficient - thank you

Waiter told me Parmesan doesn't go with the pasta

Horrible tasteless pasta with prawns, first nicht  slushy sauce. No flavour. And when I asked for Parmesan the waiter told me it doesn't go with the type of pasta, which is probably right when the flavour is right, but when there is no flavour parmesan is the saving grace

The food was delicious and the service was impeccable.
Chef Ashish came out and spoke to everyone which was a lovely touch and all the team George, Ali , Brian and Lovely made our night very special.
They're a credit to the ship

I thought the cannon of lamb was excellent but my wife wasn't impressed with the lobster.
Good service from George, Ali, Brian, Lovely & the chef Ashish.

I've attended Michelin restaurants and tasting courses.  I was surprised by the service for a budget ship.  I had menu A but I picked the wrong day which did the pairing wines.  Nevertheless Ali made the experience enjoyable with his recommendations on the wine with each course.  I certainly think due to his charming manner and good level of English and having a good understanding of when to engage with the client. Excellent and enjoyable service.

The food was delicious and the service was impeccable.
Chef Ashish came out and spoke to everyone which was a lovely touch and all the team George, Ali , Brian and Lovely made our night very special.
They're a credit to the ship
Ali our waiter who couldn't do enough for us

What an Amazing experience from start to finish!!  Food exquisite and compliments to all the staff, especially Ali our waiter who couldn't do enough for us and Ashish the chef...one of the best meals we've had and we have traveled the world!!!. Very rare you get great food and great staff.....Just amazing.....

Be back again !

This was ok - mainly due to Angel who normally works in the Tapas restaurant apparently - we ordered champagne (it was New Year's Eve!) which didn't arrive until our main course - issues with bar manager ordering apparently….not good … staff generally seemed inexperienced…..

Great service received from all the staff on the tapas restaurant last night. Angel and the team (apologies didn't catch there names) made sure we had everything we needed and if not more. Thank you for looking after us.

We would like to give a great big 'thank you' to some exceptional staff, who have really gone above and beyond to make our dining experience outstanding. They are; Dhananajay, Kavin and Daniel who have served us on several occasions around table 444. They are so comical and they have all really looked after us. We feel very lucky to have met them. 😃
